itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, June 26, 2013
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, June 26, 2013
description: President Obama is on his way to Africa for a week-long trip that will take him to Senegal, South Africa and Tanzania. The visit is, in part, aimed at increasing U.S. trade and investment on the continent. China's markets are down as the country's central bank cracks down on 'shadow banking' by tightening credit. And 401(k), 403(b) -- which retirement plan is the best for you?

byline: Noel King, Rob Schmitz, Queena Kim, Stacey Vanek Smith, Bruce Johnson, Paddy Hirsch, David Brancaccio and Denise-Marie Guerra
